title: Mechanical Watch Face
summary: Luxury mechanical brushed steel watch face for round and square displays
developerAddress: Russia, Moscow, 123060 Marshala Biryuzova street, 40, flat 65.
description: Dominique Delacroix, a private manufacturer of quality timepieces preserves a long tradition of luxury watchmaking and continues with innovations, providing it's second Android wear watch face, further enriching the modern gadget with an elegant and classic design with a high recognition value.Premium Android Wear watch face supports both round and square displays.FEATURES- Luxury premium android wear watch face - Dimmed mode supports reduced colours on older devices and full colour on modern devices for premium look- Realistic look without battery drain- After installing on the smartphone, the app automatically installs on the connected smartwatch. Effective installation will be finished with a pop up on message on the smart watch. You can activate the watch face from the smartwatch: Long press on the current watch face, swipe right until you see DelacroixBrushed watch face. Press on it to select it.If the Application doesn't appear:- uninstall the face- restart device- connect smartwatch and phone- install the app-let us know and we help youIf you have any questions, happy with the watchface, not happy with the watchface, have suggestions on new design or features, let us know at vdatainsight@gmail.comThe application is running on Moto 360, LG Watch R, Sony Smart Watch 3, Huawei, LG Urbane 1
descriptionHTML:
Dominique Delacroix, a private manufacturer of quality timepieces preserves a long tradition of luxury watchmaking and continues with innovations, providing it's second Android wear watch face, further enriching the modern gadget with an elegant and classic design with a high recognition value.

Premium Android Wear watch face supports both round and square displays.

FEATURES
- Luxury premium android wear watch face
- Dimmed mode supports reduced colours on older devices and full colour on modern devices for premium look
- Realistic look without battery drain
- After installing on the smartphone, the app automatically installs on the connected smartwatch. Effective installation will be finished with a pop up on message on the smart watch. You can activate the watch face from the smartwatch: Long press on the current watch face, swipe right until you see DelacroixBrushed watch face. Press on it to select it.

If the Application doesn't appear:
- uninstall the face
- restart device
- connect smartwatch and phone
- install the app
-let us know and we help you

If you have any questions, happy with the watchface, not happy with the watchface, have suggestions on new design or features, let us know at vdatainsight@gmail.com

The application is running on Moto 360, LG Watch R, Sony Smart Watch 3, Huawei, LG Urbane 1
comments: Looks great! Would love it on my apple watch too!
